metadata.name: Colourful Compassion
metadata.description:
Colourful Compassion

A rhetoric, isn't it beautiful to find ourselves enjoying solitude?
A moment passing right in front of our eyes and soul,
Our heart trying to catch the fluttering invisible butterfly
that is meant to find itself home back in you~

There's peace and prosperity in perspectives,
When clarity strikes our beautiful minds
and each feather leaving our palms like eyes and saline,
an ephemeral experience turning into ethereal epiphany ~

That's what life is all about,
spur of the moment redefined...

Colour Compassion is a confluence of our two worlds, with Ashwini creating a picture with his words and Hetansh speaking through his photos.

Edition: 1/1 

Details of Photo:

Location: Jaisalmer, Rajasthan, India
Time: Sunrise 
Year Created: 2021 
Gears: Phone
